esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for latency is > 5 seconds, and the alerting rule is grouped by statement user_id and host name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the avg_query_time value in the WHERE clause, which is specified in milliseconds. 
 FROM metrics-postgresql.statement-default
| STATS avg_query_time=avg(postgresql.statement.query.time.mean.ms) by host.name, postgresql.statement.user.id
| WHERE avg_query_time >= 5000
